stage_message: Select a type for your information product

You can (optionally) refine your type with a subtype. In such case, the metadata requirements of the subtype will apply. What is called subtype can have the character of an attribute such as internal, template or interactive, which tells the user more about the kind of usage.
Provide generic information about the information product
Provide creator, contributor and contact information
If applicable, provide publication details and related events

stage_label: Dates and link to external resources
stage_message: Provide date of embargo if applicable and link your information product to related resources
